description.translate: Your pain will finally end, along with your tomorrows.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Vei gal atar\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Ta peine prendra finalement fin,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7en même temps que tes lendemains.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Your pain will finally end,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7along with your tomorrows.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7力§a1 §7速度§a2 §7恢魔§a1 §7攻速§c-1\"}"]}}
